div.head: 風頑急疾
div.div: acute wind ailment that has become stubborn

bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

entry.def: acute wind ailment that has become stubborn

sense.def: Pathological Condition Combined Designation of feng 風② , wind, diseases that began with an acute onset and then turned difficult to heal. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry wu tou 烏頭：自非風頑急疾，不可輕投 , “If it is not an acute wind ailment that has become stubborn , it must not be resorted to lightheartedly”.
